title: The Sweet Voice Heard Through the Phone

infobox.Title:: The Sweet Voice Heard Through the Phone
infobox.Japanese title:: 受話器ごしのスウィートボイス  (Juwaki Goshi no Suīto Boisu)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Ran Mouri  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi  Eri Kisaki

infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi  Yoichi Nishijima as Haruhiko Nagamine  Miyuri Shimabukuro as Mayako Nagamine  Yusuke Shirai as Ippei Aragaki  Haruhi Nanao as Kyoko Yufunezawa

sections.Situation:
Kogoro is hired by a beautiful woman named Mayako Nagamine, but after a call, when he meets her, she is found murdered in a park.

The only suspect is Mayako's husband Haruhiko Nagamine, but it seems that the murder was't done by him. Another suspect named Ippei Aragaki is added and it seems he was in the scene before Haruhiko. Who is the real murderer?
